How to generate KML files in Ektoo client and SyncServer

= Introduction =
The followind step by step procedure depict how we can generate kml files with mesh4x.

==1. Suppose a MsAccess file with the following data:

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_18.png

==2. Open Ektoo client and complete source and target data sources 
http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_1.png

==3. Open map window
http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_2.png

==4. Complete title, description fields

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_3.png

Write a text

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_4.png

Choose a property name from the combo box and add to title field

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_5.png

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_6.png

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_7.png

==5. Complete Map lat/lon

For no map your data choose the following option:

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_8.png

http://mesh4x.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/files/mesh4x_kml_ektoo_9.png
